subject: Discrimination
Soccer
Race and Ethnicity
UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: The beauty of the strikers. The hatred of the mob. The incompatibility of a game that wants to be, and by now ought to be, beyond racial prejudice.
snippet: The beauty of the strikers. The hatred of the mob. The incompatibility of a game that wants to be, and by now ought to be, beyond racial prejudice.
